subject: Re: Writing tests first
msgSnippet: For an example of teaching test driven design, check out this article http://xp123.com/xplor/xp0201/ It is a series of exercises of tests that lead to the
messageBody:
For an example of teaching test driven design, check out this article
http://xp123.com/xplor/xp0201/

It is a series of exercises of tests that lead to the development of a
simple spreadsheet, including finally a GUI for it. I went through it
and even though I'd been practicing test driven design for a while, I
learned a lot.

Erik Husby
